Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to statewide opioid settlement agreements
Summary: Clarifies that certain provisions related to statewide opioid settlement agreements shall cover settlements and releases related to any entities involved in the prescription drug marketing, supply and payment chain that may have contributed to the opioid epidemic through illegal conduct.
LawCode: Amd ยง25.18, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to statewide opioid settlement agreements
